titles.title: Electronic Prescription Drug Act of 2007
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide incentives to physicians for writing electronic prescriptions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 8/1/2007--Introduced. Electronic Prescription Drug Act of 2007 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for payments to physicians for writing electronic prescriptions.
